about_the_game:
Are you ready for a thrilling adventure step by step?

In the addictive game "Marauder Knight," you'll have the chance to become the most skilled thief in the world of heists! You've been assigned to steal a legendary collection of ore in the underground world. However, with each ore you take, the number of knights chasing you will increase. The more ore you steal, the more points you earn, but the risk of getting caught by the knights will also grow.

The game combines skill and strategy. But be careful, because the knights will be watching you at all times! With constantly updated content, you'll have the opportunity to explore new locations and missions. Are you ready? Embark on a smuggling adventure in dangerous streets and experience a thrilling journey with "Marauder Knight"!
